name: you are dead (Noah Weiner)
description:
You are reborn. You live a long, full life. You are dead. You are reborn. You live a long, full life. You are dead. You are reborn. You live a long, full life. You are dead.

Your soul drifts down the river between lives. Can you break the cycle?

Controls

Left/Right Arrow Keys - Turn rowboat
Up Arrow Key - Row

Ludum Dare Page

Rate it at https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/you-are-dead
